Appetizers.Name: Mozzerella Sticks
Appetizers.Description: Breaded Mozzerella deep fried in oil and served with marinara sauce

Appetizers.Name: Nachos
Appetizers.Description: tortilla chips covered in melted cheese, topped with sour cream, beef, and guacomole

Cold Sandwiches.Name: Turkey and cheese on rye
Cold Sandwiches.Description: Turkey deli meat and american cheese between two slices of rye bread

Cold Sandwiches.Name: Ham and cheese sub
Cold Sandwiches.Description: ham and american cheese on a hogie roll

Hot Sandwiches.Name: philly cheesesteak
Hot Sandwiches.Description: shaved beef cooked and layered onto a hogie roll topped with melted provolone

Hot Sandwiches.Name: chipotle chicken panini
Hot Sandwiches.Description: hot grilled chicken topped with chipotle peppers between two slices of bread pressed between a panini press until golden brown

Desserts.Name: Ice cream sundae
Desserts.Description: Vanilla ice cream topped with chocolate syrup and whipped cream

Desserts.Name: Brownie
Desserts.Description: Warm brownie square with chocolate chips throughout

Drinks.Name: Old fashioned
Drinks.Description: Whiskey mixed with simple syrup and bitters on the rocks topped with muddled fruit

Drinks.Name: Lemonade
Drinks.Description: In a pitcher you mix one part lemon juice to three parts water and 1-2cups of sugar depending, served on ice
